## FieldColour.COLOURS property

An array of colour strings for the palette. Copied from goog.ui.ColorPicker.SIMPLE\_GRID\_COLORS All colour pickers use this unless overridden with setColours.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static COLOURS: string[];
```
